title: nIyE tuNai
sahitya:
nIyE tuNai ennakku AvAi ayyanE nIla mayil mEl amar vElayyanE


anupallavi

  mAya valaiyil uzhala tOyum kavalai aghala mati kulaiyAdu nAn magizhum gati peravE


caraNam    nOyurum pOdu nondu tEyumuru shEyinai tAi arumaip-pAnguDan tAnguvadu pOlavE
tIya vinaip-piNiyin tollai tIrumAru nIyenai aNaiyum nEyanAga vENumE
